Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $200 by me, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or serve as a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $180. Should you have any questions or require more information, please let me know. I look forward to the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
